name: Treasure Rush (Scorplings)
description:
Welcome to treasure rush, an exciting turn based strategy game! This is our original idea.

First enter how many points a player must score to win. Move the blue player with the wasd keys and the red player with the arrow keys. Go to your opponent's treasury and return to yours to score points. You can also earn points by walking on your opponent, but this doesn't work in your opponent's base. If you don't score a point in 30 moves, it is a draw. Good Luck!
